values:
Here I am, sitting in borders, in the self-help section... How ominous.

I haven't spoken to Scott in 5 days, he moves to melbourne in less than a week. Well he hasn't spoken to me either...

I'm currently looking at books titled 'how to walk in high heels: the girls guide to everything' and 'love in 90 days: the essential guide to finding your own true love'

Which one do I buy? I was going to get both, but I can only really afford one.

I know how to walk in heels... Just.

Do i want to learn and find my own true love in 90 days?

Well yes, since I haven't had a 'proper' relationship for 5 years...

I'm going to Europe, alone. I'd rather go with someone special to share it with, but thats not going to happen.

But eh, I'm happy.... I quit my job at Optus, my last day is the Sunday after next, I'm writing for Heart mag, I'm working as a teacher at Uni. Plus I'm doing research work. I'm feeling like my life is on the right track, I just dont have Scott... And oh how i badly wish bespoke stay in canberra or agree to a long distance thing, because I would move.

Well lots of people have found my spot, so i better leave. I'll get both, my credit card will deal with it.

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

A few weeks ago a friend told me to join Okcupid - I did and pretty much began chatting with this guy, we then decided to meet, so last Monday we went to the movies and lunch for which he paid (he took the day off work).

We spent like 5 hours just hanging out, it was nice, but the kicker is he's moving to Melbourne in 3 weeks for work.

So we've been SMSing a shit load and confusing the he'll out of each other, so I set it straight and just let him know that I liked him but I wasn't going to pursue anything coz he's moving and I wasn't sure if he wanted anything.

He then told me he liked me too but coz he was moving he didn't want either of us to get hurt feelings.

So the we were on the same page and he then randomly told me he wanted to kiss me but if it's good he's be upset about moving.

I ended up at his place last night - and honestly - it was amaZing.

Neither one of us could stop smiling. And I have never been kissed as wonderfully as I was last night.

I've always wondered what it would be like to have that perfect kiss and moment, and it was delivered last night.

I'm so happy, but at the same time really sad.

He briefly mentioned a long distance thing, but we didn't go further into it- but I would move with him tomorrow.

But it's only been a couple of weeks.

I just can't even explain how I feel - it's like ahhhh I cant explain it without being corny!

We were just meant to be. That feeling, you know?

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

So if Caitlyn is thinking of the correct bloke I met yesterday he's getting married :(:(:(:(:(

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

Well technically there was no 'meeting' as such... There was a lot of looking at each other though... And I found out his name lol ... I want him. It was like I'd seen my real home. It was weird in a good way. I need to find him again.

I'm such a chicken, I should have just talked to him.

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

My dreams often feel worthless - unattainable - useless - I see so many people who have surpassed me and I wonder with all my issues if I have the ability to follow my dreams or if they'll just stay that way.

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

Follow me on Twitter so I can follow you

@rikibee :)

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

so today i've felt shit already - just a really bad day for me.

then my ex friended me on facebook, so i felt more shit. then another one poked me, and i felt shitter, and discovered he is now married... riiiiight.

and now, the ex who friended me is texting me.

I checked out his facebook, and seriously he is now what i wanted him to be when we were dating - fucking grown up.

*sigh*... anyway i went up to mt ainslie, coz i go there when i feel shit, and when i was driving back down i swerved to miss a 'roo (I know.. never swerve...but i did...) and in the process, almost went over the goddamn side and now i've hurt my fucking shoulder.

and i'm fucking fucking fucking fucking fuckity FUCKING MAD and i want to scream. but i wont. but i should, but i wont.

so I'll do it virtually...

AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK


don't feel better.

riki.

I have recently added an application on facebook which allows people to view my livejournal - I'm not sure if this will be the end of me or the beginning... 

I hold things in here that I tell no one... so this will be curious to see who actually reads these things and/or cares... 

Well I must get off to work.. how exciting - I'll be back at 6am and seep til about 1pm... 

I hope all is well with everyone on her e- I recently got back from northern nsw - where i went to visit my mum for my birthday - If you're on facebook look me up billy-arika errington and add me!

riki

I scored 34 on Dr. Phil's personality test
Others see you as sensible, cautious, careful and practical. They see you as clever, gifted, or talented, but modest. Not a person who makes friends too quickly or easily, but someone who's extremely loyal to friends you do make and who expect the same loyalty in return. Those who really get to know you realize it takes a lot to shake your trust in your friends, but equally that it takes you a long time to get over it if that trust is ever broken.

I guess this is why Dr. Phil Gets paid so much.

My dog sami - who was ten - was killed today by my other dogs in an accident.

The vet said it happens very often, just the wrong place and they're gone.

He bled to death. It would have taken ten minutes for him to die, and i wasnt here. 

i sent him away to be cremated today. I'll have to get a nice jugy jar thing to put him in and keep with me. 

I don't remember not having him in my life, snooring away.

He should be snooring, he should be lying on a pile of clothes on my floor, snooring right now. but he's not. he's in some cold vet place waiting to be taken to sydney to be burned. 

i wont feel his fluffy body anymore and I can't snuggle him when I'm sad, I can't call him in the middle of the night to jump onto my bed. 

i feel like a part of me is gone.

SO i just got back from my sisters a few days ago... I drove up for her birthday and stayed for almost a week... it was fantastic.. lazy days on the beach tanning up.. I'm as brown as what my mum was before she got black. 

It's beautiful. My legs need more doing though. 

So i stayed at my Niece Megan's new house with her daughter Lily... it was nice.. Kristy Megan's older sister drove down from Walca and stayed for the same amount of time that I did and stayed at her mums house. Her partner came down too.. they've been together 4 years and I'd never met him. He seemed a bit strange... like he didn't know how to act around me... at first I thought it was coz i was black... because he's one of those country bogan miner boys... and he just wouldn't even look at me or talk to me.. and he did once but he looked elsewhere while asking me a question about the tv... it was weird. Especially since he met these other people while we were there and he was best buddies by the end of the night... BUt eh.. there's worse things in the world to worry about. 

I'm watching the first season of buffy.. when she finds out that angel is a vampire. 

So it was a fabulous drive up through sydney and newcastle - my sister lives in Anna bay which is just near port stephens.. about 60kms from Newcastle right on the beach. 

It was tops, i even surfed. hahaha. 

Ohhh  when I got home I had a new car! It's tops (amy took photos - imma steal them off her so i can post!) Its a mambo painted suzuki vitara.. it was painted by Dave Mckay from Mambo in 1991... it's only done like 98,000kms..fucking drives tops.. bit sticky though but good. Amy and I go zooming around with the top off haha (We're hot ay ayms!) 

Anyway.. Amy is leaving soon :( she is going home to Rockhampton for a few weeks

I will miss my amy... :( Cube just wont be the same without. 

ooh and the possible new job - Uluru! If i get it I will be off to the community near Uluru (Mutijulu) to live for 3 months and will organise the summer sports program for the young black kids up there - it'll be tops! Get Nike to fix up the basketball court they built 5 years ago which is no run down... *sigh* it'll be gooooood!

LISA! I miss you... we must have dinner before I leave! Usual place? xxxxx

riki

Okay I'm back... I've been in sydney, then Anna Bay (an hour north of newcastle)   visiting my sister for her 44th birthday. 
I saw my two nieces and my nieces daughter, so nice.. i stayed for like 5 days or something it was nice... way tanned up 

GOTTA NEW CAR!!! so if you see me zipping around canberra in a Mambo triple M "coca cola" suzuki vitara that's me! 

it rocks, mum bought it for me for christmas. 

anyway i just got home this afternoon from my sisters - it was a tiring drive then i was at my dad's for tea so i'm pretty buggered. so i'm off to sleep. 
photos coming soon. 

riki
My new TATTS!

So i went to Chris and got 2 more tatts done this morning. 

Fucking brilliant!

I got these three black stars on my right wrist, they're pretty big. and my own drawing of traditional Aboriginal stuff on my left wrist in blue. 

I got my om touched up the other day too. 

So i'm sitting on 5. 

I gotta get to 7 

coz that's my lucky number. 

But i still gotta get my b on my neck, my infinity on my ankle, my astro boy on my back, my water lily on my back and my heart on my hand. 

Going to dad's barbie tonight. 

should be fun. 

Put some more pics up on myspace so go looK!

www.myspace.com/memememooo

reeks

My parents... got married this day 25 years ago... 

isn't that sweet? 

TOTALLY. 

it would be even sweeter if they hadn't divorced almost 20 years ago.
I have a strand of hair (god knows how) stuck under my laptop screen... it's really irritating, it's right over the start menu.... errrgh

So I went and had din dins with lisa and eddie last night, it was good times. Good laughs.  We're going to have a picnic on sunday. 

Going out tomorrow night ... 

Shane rang me tonight and was like.. Man reeks! you were so plastered the other saturday... man... I so don't remember so much stuff. 

Bad. 

I hate embarrassing myself. it's so easy when you look like me. 

god i wish i was just hot. 

reeks.

I'll be back in canberra on saturday! I got a flight out of ballina to sydney then sydney to canberra for like 300 bucks... so I'm happy about that, I can't wait to get home.. I've been using a drop hole toilet... it's grose.

I hate camping.. even if dad's caravan is equipt with every state of the art gadget imaginable. 

My dad's been watching Roswell season 3 on his tv (yes he has a very fancy flat screen telly with dvd n shit in his 11 foot caravan). 

He's more obsessed than me. 

I have 100's of photos and HUNNNDREDS of video of Lily my nieces 14 months old... she's so CUTE!!!

Back 430pm Saturday ... YAY!

School starts back on Monday... ergh...

I have the flu to top it off.

Riki

So today I went to work for 2 hours - it was surprisinly decent. Then I went to woden optus to fax those things that i needed to prove who i was and not a fraud - only to have their fax machine stop working and it was almost 5pm at this time so i didn't have time to go anywhere else.. so now I have to do that tomorrow.. Kim my personal account manager is getting so cranky about how much they're stuffing me around.

Then I went and met Lisa (lisawolf ) at lisboa, and we had a good few hours chatting and walking around woden and standing at her car chatting hehe. It felt like I'd know her for years! 

Then I had to return some videos so i took them to video ezy then I picked up the BMA to bring home and have a read... then I saw who was on the cover - My ex and his stupid wannabe punk band so i put it down and it made my good mood turn into a "ERGH! I HATE HIM" mood. 

So now i'm eating twisties. 

Jess comes home in the morning!!! I leave on monday to go visit my big sister and her daughter and grand daughter! it's gonna be tops :D

Riki

I think i should be a stylist.. 

I dress people great. 

Myself.. not so great. LOL. 

But I know how to make people look good. 

But then I don't really want to do it as a full time job.. I just like doing it for fun. 

Plus I like shopping.. I lie.. I live in David Jones, Jeans West, Jag, Myers, Donna Karen.. david Lawrence... *sigh*

if i could I would marry the mall.  but not any malls here.. they aren't so great. You have to go to three to find one thing. but.. the mall of america.. oh my god.. I spent at least 5 hours of each day there for 2 weeks. that was heaven like you would not believe.

I got a new fish.. hesheit is a catfish named donkey!

Yes.. donkey. 

Donkey joins, freckles, poncho and panda.. and hesheit has lots of fun eating algae and floating around and hiding. 

What a LIFE!

I'm going away in a week to visit my sister and my sisters daughter and my sisters grand daughter! oh my gawd.. I'm old if my sister is a grandma right? 

New joke at the sketch.. check it out. 

Sketchycrew.com how many times do I have to tell you to join! Have you joined yet? JOIN!

All turned out well on the down below front... picked up my car on saturday morning, dad was in a better mood, mum so much wasnt but she apologised for being a bitch and then was like "but you have to remember your dad and I have ptsd.." i told her to stop using it as an excuse basically because its post traumatic for them it's not suppose to cause me trauma. and she said she's sorry that she made me feel crap. 

So all weekend I spent cleaning! I kid you not.. we made a new laundry in this back room that was being used for nothing, so we have two laundry's now.. that may seem not cool to some.. but i like building things and making stuff.. so it was cool for me LOL. 

So jess and victor have their own laundry and mum and i have one too. 

Then I proceded to go through boxes that I haven't unpacked in 3 -7 years!! I found my grade 8 school diary, my grade 9, grade 10.. oh my god.. and photographs... terrible!! lol it was such fun.. oh and I found this scarf i was knitting like 3 years ago so i'm attempting to finish it LOL. then I cleaned the bathroom, the kitchen, the loungeroom.. I even scrubbed mum's persians... and I cleaned my room and made my bed.. I finished at about 6 o'clock last night. started at 9am (in the morning!!) on saturday.

my doggie hurt his hip.. he was jumping out of dad's wrangler and must have knocked his leg on the towbar and jarred it coz he's been hopping along for the last few days. But its getting better. 

OH OH OH AND IM A FRAUD!!! optus mobile has called me a fraud... coz this stupid idiot kid there called the wrong number looking for me and just assumed i was a fraud!!! so kim my personal account manager is sorting it out and giving me TONS AND TONS of "we're really sorry please dont move carriers" credit. so I don't think I'll have to pay my bill for awhile. What kind of new phone should I get? I've got a sony ericson P910i at the moment.. so not much can out do it for me... i've looked and cannot find.. any suggestions? ... no?

Taking my dogs to the lake now for a walk. 




Reeks

Possum is gone. 

Why are people dickheads?

If you don't want to talk to me - tell me, don't fucking act like a dickhead and just make up excuses. 

So you can get fucked you tosser. 

:D I'm ignoring you from now on anyway. And any others like you. 

Moving right along.. 

I'm going to visit my sister and my uncle and my niece and my nieces baby girl monday week .. crusing up with dad in his caravan for a week or so then I'm going to hop the train back. 

Why do I have a job with computers and fixing them? I have no idea... I keep getting this stupid error safe debugger thing pop up... I have every fucking product under the sun that's suppose to stop this crap... 

I hate technology, I know NOTHING! I can fix other peoples, without knowing what I'm doing.. But I can't fix my own. 

Retard.

SO my sociology exam today went pretty alright.. 3 hours of writing.. my wrist is killing me. I'm pretty happy with it all though, for the major essay in section c I managed to write like 5 pages on how inequality affects life chances. there were massive amounts of multi choice questions though.. they made my eyes play tricks on me. 

so I can't really decide what subjects to do next semester.. there isn't anything decent. 

I signed up for Indigneous societies and adaption or something, lit studies 2, and food and beverage something or other... which apparently gives you no credit points and has no study load... So i have to ring up about that tomorrow. 

my hand is killing me from writing so fast and eractic today so I'm off to soothe it.. LOL

riki :D

p.s
the possum still hasn't been moved... =/
there is a dead possumm on the electricity wire outside my back porch. Riki

today my dad's new phone arrived. so he took me to brekky down in fyshwick then we went and picked up his mattress for his caravan. 

then i went back to hall with him and cleaned his caravan and made his bed and told him if its messy tomorrow i'll slap him. 

So tomorrow I have to go to Lucy's at 9 and study ergh. 

Dad is itchy to get going, so we're out at the end of the month, he wants me to go up with him and see uncle alex, and then hop the train back from lismore, so i'll probably be gone for a week or so, so that sounds sweet. he's going to go up further north and over west and look for a yacht to buy, then go on a big sailing adventure, and I get the wrangler!!! :D

I'm still losing heaps of weight.. I haven't been eating. Not because I'm starving myself or anything, but because I'm not hungry, like.. i don't even think about it. If dad didn't take me to breky practically every day I probably wouldn't eat at all, because at the moment, that's all I've been eating. Brekky with him. 

I told the doctor that but she doesn't really see how its a problem, she just told me to like have an alarm and eat even if i'm not hungry.. but it seems all I can really stomach is cereal or salad when i do eat.. so i dunno. 

oh well. 

lardeedar... 

who cares. 
<lj-cut> YOU fill in the blanks about ME even if u dont have any idea what they are 
and send it back to me in a comment...

But first post a blank one out to all your friends so they can return the favor to you.
@}-;---

My name:

Who is the love of my life:

Where did we meet:

Take a stab at my middle name:

How long have you known me:

When is the last time that we saw each other:

Do I smoke:

Do I drink:

When is my birthday:

What was your first impression of upon meeting me:

Do I have any siblings:

What's one of my favorite things to do:

Am I funny:

What's my favorite type of music:

What is the best feature about me:

Am I shy or outgoing:

Am I a rebel or do I follow the rules:

Would you consider me a friend/good friend:

Would you call me preppy, average, sporty, punk, hippie, glam, nerdy, snobby, or something else (what):

What is a memory we have once had:

Have you ever hugged me:

What is my worst habit:

If you and I were stranded on a desert island, what one thing that I would bring?

Are we friends:

Will you repost this so I can do it for you?

</lj-cut>
riki

So here I am lying in bed with my dog snooring like he owns my pillows and reading the notes i wrote for my exam while watching lost and drinking chocolate milk out of my Guiness glass.

Oww, and I just hit my head on the bed head. 

<lj-cut>

Danny wrote me this really sweet email last night, telling me how everything at work was going, and all the neat new techie stuff that we've been getting, and basically how I can work the shifts i wanna work when i wanna work. 

Picked up mums car this morning - cost me two grand. I am officially in $14, 500 worth of debt, which nothing to show for it but great hair and fairly sweet jhebus clothes and a growing dvd collection. I added 200 cigarettes to it today, and the last days of disco, and the tenth kingdom series. 

oh no.. poor john locks leg is stuck. 

So I went and saw Dr. Ann on tuesday, that was pretty decent, she wants me to see her every month and keep seeing Marg at the dept. of veterans affairs. she's weening me off the 75mg of xefexor or whatever its called and put me on half a tab of 20mg Lovan. then is moving me up up and away. 

I got dad a new 3g phone, which should arrive tomorrow, he's pretty excited. 

Timmy told jess that he has a crush on me, and loves my boobs LOL. this is a dude I've known for almost a year, who I've always thought was gay. 
</lj-cut>
I think Silas thinks that we're going to get back together. Why he thinks that I don't know... I'm not moving back to Melbourne any time soon and he's not planning a move here. 
<lj-cut>
I'm tagging along with dad at the end of the month up north to anna bay to visit my sister and niece and my nieces daughter for a few days.. probably jump a bus back or something... I might drop into Raymond Terrace and see Bec and her new baby and have a booty call with Brian. 

I got my sociology essay back - I got a horrific result back. He cut me to shreads. he even picked on the dot points I used for the bibliography... and marked me down for it. for friggen dot points.. then he marked me down for it being late, when he gave me an extension!! So i have to go talk to him about it... Lucy reckons he was just in a fowl mood. 

Went and saw The Break-Up tonight with mum, it wasn't bad... I thought about Silas through the whole thing.... Vince Vaughns character is just... so Silas, except for the end dinner bit. (I'm not giving it away!)
</lj-cut>
Then I thought about how Adam broke up with me.. and how he broke my heart. But still tells me he wants to be with me, then goes on an indefinate trip overseas... He can just... deal with it himself. I'm so over him. I'm just not over the way he thinks I can be okay with everything and we're just going to fall back in place. 
<lj-cut>
Went to Uni on tuesday - Del was there - it was just her and I in the computer lab.. and she was just being a dick you know banging things, and turning her music up really loud and just being a knob head.. i didn't even realise it was her for about 10 minutes I was so engrosed in what I was doing. 

Then I had a good talk to Paulie who works at the Indigenous Centre - he's bi polar, and he gave me all this neat stuff to do like breathing styles and things like that and we had a good chat, and he told me that over the years I've looked after alot of the mob out there and him and I can lean on him if I ever need to. So that made me feel good. I realise that people actually do see me and aren't fooled by lies that seem to get spread about me alot. 

Dr. Ann said that I put on a pretty top notch facade.. and I need to learn how to feel my emotions on my face and things like that and not smile when I'm talking about bad shit... apparently for the whole 2 hours while I was telling her my 'dogs dinner' of a life story i had a smile on my face the whole time. I just don't realise I'm doing it. It's just been a coping mechanism I guess. 
</lj-cut>
But Oh well.. :)

I'll figure it all out one day - I've got a massive amount of time to work on things. 
<lj-cut>
I'm feeling pretty good so far. 

Lisa - I appreciate you so much. And I wish I could give what you give me, back to you. (one day! i promise!)
HayHay.. all these years - I'm glad I've known you and I look forward to many more!
Donnaleekiss - I appreciate your wise words, they definetly sink in!

I finally got my pictures from perth developed!!! like 8 months later!! LOL Dan and brett have been hassling me for them lol they were so excited when i told them i finally did it!
</lj-cut>
riki :D

I had a fair few shit dreams last night about adam.. But I had a HOT one about Jose :P LOL here's some dodgy pics from our weekend and a few from toooooday. mum's making me salad for dinner.. i'm obsessed with caesar salad and mandarins.. it's all i've been eating. I'm going to see a new psyc tomorrow - dr. ann... see how it goes.. I'm gonna go let some fyshwick fireworks off! Some Beach! woooh more beach! Some badges in my car.. i got the '6' one for my 6th birthday ! LOL crusing along in the car Charlie is a camera hog dog Trying to avoid a bad photo - it didn't work Mum and Charlie the camera hog!

captinben became exactly like every other guy.. .

made me like him.. only to use me to get back with his ex. 

What a great guy...  

Why do I bother liking people? Why do I bother opening myself up to people when they just do the exact some thing...

I don't feel like I have any friends. 

I think I'm afraid to make friends. Incase they judge me. 

Jess just came to sit on the couch with me...

we sort of had a fight last night. Via text message... while she was downstairs and I was in my bed.. I felt like I was 12. But we're over it now. It's all good. I think she realises now that she doesn't need to act like she's taking care of everyone... because she needs some taking care of herself. 

It seems like every friend I have, is somewhere else. 

I just want to know what I'm suppose to do.. because I don't know what I'm suppose to do with my life.. I always thought I knew what I was suppose to do.. but it seems like that's just all fake now. 

I guess I just want what everyone wants... to be happy and loved. And I know I am loved, I just want to feel love explode from me because I don't know what it feels like anymore. 

I just went to bed at like 730 last night and just cried. and cried. and I had no reason to. 

Mum's gone to the N.T for a few days for work up there in the community about some new policy that she's having to write for them, so she's going to ask them what they want.. my dad actually made a really positive comment about her the other day.. he was like "tell your mum to do good for them because she can"

He hasn't said a nice thing about her for 19 years... its always been really negative but if i'm negative about her, he jumps down my throat and tells me not to be like that with my mum... which i like. but he's never made a positive comment about her or her work before... I told my mum what he said and her response was just like... 'he always knew I was great at my job' 

I don't think I can... do what I'm suppose to do.

Here's some pics from last night.. the rest are on someones phone.. I have to find that phone... Me N jess  
Victor, some dude, and Me  

Me N jess  

and this is from my acupuncture yesterday morning. !!

I blocked her from sending me any more emails after the last one where she verbally abused me personally and my mother in 4 different emails.

She pushed into me at university yesterday and I've really hurt my shoulder to a point where I can hardly move my neck.

and told me that she would leave my property at the uni because she thinks i'm going to steal her things - like any of her stuff is decent. I could get better at the salvos superstore in fyshwick. 

Jessica and Victor are having a hard time - jessica told me today that victor beats her when he is drunk - and has caused 4 miscarriages.

I told her I'm not going to have him in my house anymore and he needs to go back to tasmania and she's not going with him.

But he has this control over her that... I dont know.

Today he threatened to burn her belongings. Then went for a big walk. Now he's been sitting outside in the rain for a few hours and jess jst went out there because he was knocking on the door.

So i'm about to go and see how she is.

I had to go to calvery hospital last night.. I hada bit of a breakdown.. I'm not sure what happened but mum had to call the police to come because the bathroom door was locked and she found me on the floor of the shower curled up fully clothed.

My dad came to the hospital and was really great. I hadn't eaten anything yesterday either. 

anyway the crying has stopped and i'm going to see whats going on. 

Riki

so... today Jess and I went to Charnwood to collect the last of my things (lamp... glasses etc..) and I tried to get into the house with my house key (my rent is paid up until the 6th of June)

I wasn't able to get in with my key - it didn't work.

This is an email I received from Del yesterday in response to my email the day before.

Arika,

I am breaking this chanel of conversation will email you personally.

Delephene

This is an email I wrote her today - after I had texted libby to let her know that I was unable to get into the property and if I am not able to access the property I am not liable for rent as stated by the tenants union. 

Delephene,
 
I went to the house today to collect the rest of my belongings and also clean my room and was unable to gain access to the property with my key.
 
As you are well aware, my rent is paid up until this coming friday, it is illegal for you to restrict me from being able to retrieve my belongings.
 
I will be continuing to go to the property until my rent runs out to collect the last of my things. If I am unable to gain access to my belongings inside the house still by this friday I expect a full refund of one weeks rent by you.
